situation: P often interrupted his peers during class discussions and had difficulty waiting for his turn, causing irritation among classmates.
action: A teacher aide asked P to sit at the back of the room away from the discussion instead of helping him with turn-taking techniques.
effect: P felt isolated and missed out on engaging in the conversation, which could have helped him practice social skills.
topic: Social Interaction Challenges - Difficulties with peer interactions, challanges during
